prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with elegant blue waves and a serpentine body.
I want a mythical creature that resembles a graceful dragon with a flowing tail.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the beauty of the ocean, with shimmering scales.
Make a design for a serene water Pokemon that glides smoothly through the air.
Imagine a dragon-like creature with a sleek, curling body and soft blue tones.
Show me a Pokemon that represents tranquility and majesty in aquatic environments.
Design a dragon Pokemon that showcases fluid movement and enchanting colors.
